trans-unit.source: The type of object contained as items in the thread-safe collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含在具備執行緒安全的集合中做為項目的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains objects of a type specified by the generic parameter as elements.

The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> stores data in a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> container and provides an object that can be set and used to synchronize access to the collection so that it is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> 會將資料儲存在 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> 容器中，並提供可設定及用來同步處理集合之存取的物件，使其具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> container can be recovered using the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.Items%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> 方法，可以復原 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.Items%2A> 容器。

trans-unit.source: The synchronized object can be recovered using the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若使用 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.SyncRoot%2A> 屬性，則可以復原同步處理的物件。

trans-unit.source: It can only be set using one of the constructors that take the `syncRoot` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它只能使用其中一個採用 `syncRoot` 參數的建構函式來設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1" /> class.
The object used to synchronize access the thread-safe collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1" /> class with the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
If multiple instances of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> are created using the same `syncRoot`, then access is protected across all instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> 的多個執行個體都是使用相同的 `syncRoot` 建立，則所有執行個體的存取都會受到保護。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="syncRoot" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection of elements used to initialize the thread-safe collection.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1" /> class from a specified enumerable list of elements and with the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
<paramref name="syncRoot" /> or <paramref name="list" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The object used to synchronize access the thread-safe collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of type <c>T</c> elements used to initialize the thread-safe collection.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1" /> class from a specified array of elements and with the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
<paramref name="syncRoot" /> or <paramref name="list" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to be added to the collection.
Adds an item to the thread-safe, read-only collection.
The value set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
Removes all items from the collection.
Removes all items from the collection.
The object to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the collection contains an element with a specific value.
<see langword="true" /> if the element value is found in the collection; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
The value set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
The destination <see cref="T:System.Array" /> for the elements of type <c>T</c> copied from the collection.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to a specified array, starting at a particular index.
Gets the number of elements contained in the thread-safe collection.
The number of elements contained in the thread-safe, read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 具備執行緒安全之唯讀集合中所含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the synchronized collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> for objects of the type stored in the collection.
Removes all items from the collection.
Returns the index of the first occurrence of a value in the collection.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value in the collection.
The value set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
The zero-based index of the element to be retrieved from the collection.
The object to be inserted into the collection as an element.
Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
If the `index` is equal to the number of elements in the collection, the item is appended to the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 等於集合中的項目數目，則項目會附加至清單。

trans-unit.source: If the `index` is less than the number of elements in the collection, the elements that follow the point of insertion of the item move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 小於集合中的項目數目，則項目插入點後方的項目會向下移動，以容納新項目。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The value set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
The zero-based index of the collection where the object is to be inserted.
The object to be inserted into the collection.
Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
If the `index` is equal to the number of elements in the collection, the item is appended to the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 等於集合中的項目數目，則項目會附加至清單。

trans-unit.source: If the `index` is less than the number of elements in the collection, the elements that follow the point of insertion of the item move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 小於集合中的項目數目，則項目插入點後方的項目會向下移動，以容納新項目。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The value set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
The zero-based index of the element to be retrieved from the collection.
Gets an element from the thread-safe collection with a specified index.
The object in the collection that has the specified <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定 <paramref name="index" /> 之集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
Gets the list of elements contained in the thread-safe collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of elements that are contained in the thread-safe, read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />，這些項目包含在具備執行緒安全的唯讀集合中。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the collection.
Removes the first occurrence of a specified item from the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if item was successfully removed from the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The elements in the collection that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot and their indices are updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 集合中位於已移除之項目後面的項目會向上移動，以佔用空出的位置，而且其索引也會跟著更新。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to be retrieved from the collection.
Removes an item at a specified index from the collection.
The elements in the collection that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot and their indices are updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 集合中位於已移除之項目後面的項目會向上移動，以佔用空出的位置，而且其索引也會跟著更新。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The zero-based index of the element to be retrieved from the collection.
Removes an item at a specified <paramref name="index" /> from the collection.
The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The zero-based index of the object to be replaced.
The object to replace
Replaces the item at a specified index with another item.
The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
Gets the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
An object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步處理存取具備執行緒安全之集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read only.
This property always returns `false` because the collection can be added to and so is not read only.
trans-unit.target: 因為可以新增項目至該集合，使其不屬於唯讀性質，所以這個屬性一律會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The destination <see cref="T:System.Array" /> for the elements of type <c>T</c> copied from the collection.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to a specified array, starting at a particular index.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is thread safe.
This property always returns `true` because the collection is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一律會傳回 `true`，因為該集合具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
An object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步處理存取具備執行緒安全之集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value of this `syncRoot` object can be set when creating the thread-safe collection using the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.%23ctor%28System.Object%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `syncRoot` 建構函式建立具備執行緒安全的集合時，可以設定此 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601.%23ctor%28System.Object%29> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the synchronized collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> for objects of the type stored in the collection.
The object to add to the collection.
Adds an element to the collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
The position is given by a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 位置是由以零起始的索引所提供。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the collection contains an element with a specific value.
<see langword="true" /> if the element <paramref name="value" /> is found in the collection; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
<paramref name="value" /> is not an object of the type contained in the collection.
The element in the collection whose index is being determined.
Determines the zero-based index of an element in the collection.
The index of the <paramref name="value" /> if found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> is to be inserted.
The object to insert into the collection.
Inserts an object into the collection at a specified index.
If the `index` is equal to the number of elements in the collection, the item is appended to the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 等於集合中的項目數目，則項目會附加至清單。

trans-unit.source: If the `index` is less than the number of elements in the collection, the elements that follow the point of insertion of the item move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `index` 小於集合中的項目數目，則項目插入點後方的項目會向下移動，以容納新項目。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The <paramref name="value" /> set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is fixed in size.
This property returns `false` because the collection can be added to and so is not fixed in size.
trans-unit.target: 因為可以新增項目至該集合，使其大小不固定，所以這個屬性會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read only.
This property always returns `false` because the collection can be added to and so is not read only.
trans-unit.target: 因為可以新增項目至該集合，使其不屬於唯讀性質，所以這個屬性一律會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to be retrieved from the collection.
Gets or sets the item at a specified zero-based index.
The item with the specified <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之 <paramref name="index" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value set is <see langword="null" /> or is not of the correct generic type <paramref name="T" /> for the collection.
The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The object to be removed from the collection.
Removes the first occurrence of a specified object as an element from the collection.
The elements in the collection that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot and their indices are updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 集合中位於已移除之項目後面的項目會向上移動，以佔用空出的位置，而且其索引也會跟著更新。
